title: Sticky chicken
time: Hands on time 5 mins, plus 20 mins cooking time
description: A speedy Asian-inspired chicken recipe that kids and adults alike will love.

method.Step 1: Mix the honey and sweet chilli sauce in a small pan. Add a squeeze of lime and mix well. Place on the hob and bubble over a medium heat until thickened. Meanwhile, cook the chicken thighs in a preheated oven at 180°C/fan160°C/gas 4 for 10 minutes.

method.Step 2: Brush the sauce over the chicken and return to the oven for a further 10 minutes, until golden and sticky.

method.Step 3: Serve with steamed rice and chilli sauce.
